dcterms:description: An evaluation platform for general agents, providing a variety of Atari 2600 games for reinforcement learning experiments.
dcterms:title: Atari 2600 game environment

dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman

dcterms:description: A toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms, providing various environments including Acrobot-v1 and Amidar-v0.
dcterms:title: OpenAI gym

dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman
Vicki Cheung
Ludwig Pettersson
Jonas Schneider
John Schulman
Jie Tang
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: A specific environment within OpenAI Gym designed for testing reinforcement learning algorithms, focusing on the task of balancing a two-link robot arm.
dcterms:title: Acrobot-v1

dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman
Vicki Cheung
Ludwig Pettersson
Jonas Schneider
John Schulman
Jie Tang
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: A specific environment within OpenAI Gym that simulates a classic arcade game where the player controls a character to navigate and score points.
dcterms:title: Amidar-v0
